name: [Game Jam] Boobjam
description:
Kelly and I had a short 5 hour game jam afterwork where we wanted to play around with unity joints and physics and made this...

Its more of a technical test than anything else but I thought it would be fun to share. Rotate your phone around to adjust gravity.

Original inspiration:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BSiz1zgDHNU/?taken-by=michaelmarczewski
